Hayden Fuller

About me

Hi, I'm Hayden Fuller a full-stack developer. I'm based in Sydney, Australia and I've been studying at CoderAcademy. I am interested in everything tech! Web design and data are my favourites, and I've been diving into machine learning. A passionate, driven guy who won't fail to get along with anyone. Outside of development I love food, cars, music and art.

Current / previous work


  • 2018-2019 // Bradbury Hotel and Rydges Hotel |Cocktail bartender|
  • 2017-2018 // Cabravale Diggers |Bartender|
  • 2010-2017 // McDonald's
